h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: You can find a path continuing at the top of the slope off to the right, past another Golden Lotus Guai.

The content is as follows:
You can find a path continuing at the top of the slope off to the right, past another Golden Lotus Guai.
